data:
Based on the information provided, I have identified the features that were not included in the scope of the PREVENT-IA product. Here is the list of out-of-scope features:

• Video conferencing
• Virtual reality training
• Gamification
• Social learning features (e.g. discussion forums, collaboration tools)
• Integration with wearable devices or IoT sensors
• Advanced analytics (e.g. predictive analytics, machine learning-based insights)
• Integration with other HR systems (e.g. performance management, talent management)
• Mobile app for offline access
• Integration with other safety-related systems (e.g. incident reporting, safety inspections)
• Customizable learning paths based on individual performance
• Integration with other company systems (e.g. ERP, CRM)
• Advanced security features (e.g. biometric authentication, encryption)
• Integration with other AI-powered platforms (e.g. chatbots, virtual assistants)
• Advanced reporting and analytics (e.g. drill-down reports, data visualization)
• Integration with other e-learning platforms
• Customizable user interface based on user role or department
• Integration with other company systems (e.g. payroll, benefits)

Please note that this list is not exhaustive and may not cover all the features that were not included in the scope of the PREVENT-IA product.
